trans-unit.source: Represents a Transact-SQL transaction to be made in a SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: 表示将在 SQL Server 数据库中进行的 Transact-SQL 事务。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The application creates a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction> object by calling <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> on the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序创建<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>对象通过调用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>上<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>对象。

trans-unit.source: All subsequent operations associated with the transaction (for example, committing or aborting the transaction), are performed on the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction> object.
trans-unit.target: 在执行事务 （例如，提交或中止事务），与关联的所有后续运算<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>对象。

trans-unit.source: `Try`/`Catch` exception handling should always be used when committing or rolling back a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: `Try`/`Catch` 当提交或回滚时，应始终使用异常处理<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>。

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A> and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> generate an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> if the connection is terminated or if the transaction has already been rolled back on the server.
trans-unit.target: 同时<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>和<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>生成<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>如果终止连接或事务已在服务器上回滚。

trans-unit.source: For more information on SQL Server transactions, see [Explicit Transactions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms175127\(SQL.105\).aspx) and [Coding Efficient Transactions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms187484\(SQL.105\).aspx).
trans-unit.target: 对 SQL Server 中的事务的详细信息，请参阅[显式事务](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms175127\(SQL.105\).aspx)和[编码高效事务](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms187484\(SQL.105\).aspx)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> and a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>和<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 它还演示如何使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>， <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>，和<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The transaction is rolled back on any error, or if it is disposed without first being committed.
trans-unit.target: 事务将回滚任何错误时，或如果其配置而无需第一个提交。

trans-unit.source: `Try`/`Catch` error handling is used to handle any errors when attempting to commit or roll back the transaction.
trans-unit.target: `Try`/`Catch` 错误处理用于处理任何错误，当尝试提交或回滚事务时。

trans-unit.source: Commits the database transaction.
trans-unit.target: 提交数据库事务。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A> method is equivalent to the Transact-SQL COMMIT TRANSACTION statement.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>方法相当于 TRANSACT-SQL COMMIT TRANSACTION 语句。

trans-unit.source: You cannot roll back a transaction once it has been committed, because all modifications have become a permanent part of the database.
trans-unit.target: 你不能回滚事务后它已提交，因为所有修改已变都得数据库的永久部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see SQL Server Books Online.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 SQL Server 联机丛书。

trans-unit.source: `Try`/`Catch` exception handling should always be used when committing or rolling back a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: `Try`/`Catch` 当提交或回滚时，应始终使用异常处理<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>。

trans-unit.source: Both `Commit` and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> generates an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> if the connection is terminated or if the transaction has already been rolled back on the server.
trans-unit.target: 同时`Commit`和<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>生成<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>如果终止连接或事务已在服务器上回滚。

trans-unit.source: For more information on SQL Server transactions, see "Explicit Transactions" and "Coding Efficient Transactions" in SQL Server Books Online.
trans-unit.target: 对 SQL Server 中的事务的详细信息，请参阅"显式事务"和 SQL Server 联机丛书中的"编码高效事务"。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> and a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>和<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 它还演示如何使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>， <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>，和<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The transaction is rolled back on any error.
trans-unit.target: 事务将回滚，在有任何错误。

trans-unit.source: `Try`/`Catch` error handling is used to handle any errors when attempting to commit or roll back the transaction.
trans-unit.target: `Try`/`Catch` 错误处理用于处理任何错误，当尝试提交或回滚事务时。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 在尝试提交事务时出错。

trans-unit.source: The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 已提交或回滚事务。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The connection is broken.
trans-unit.target: 连接已断开。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> object associated with the transaction, or <see langword="null" /> if the transaction is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 获取与该事务关联的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> 对象，或者如果该事务不再有效，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> object associated with the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 与事务关联的 <see cref="T:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A single application may have multiple database connections, each with zero or more transactions.
trans-unit.target: 单个应用程序可能有多个数据库连接，每个都有零个或多个事务。

trans-unit.source: This property lets you determine the connection object associated with a particular transaction created by <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性，可以确定与由创建特定事务关联的连接对象<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> for this transaction.
trans-unit.target: 为该事务指定 <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> for this transaction.
trans-unit.target: 该事务的 <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="ReadCommitted" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="ReadCommitted" />。

trans-unit.source: Parallel transactions are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持并行事务。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Data.IsolationLevel> applies to the whole transaction.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Data.IsolationLevel>应用于整个事务。

trans-unit.source: For more information on SQL Server isolation levels, see "Isolation Levels in the Database Engine" in SQL Server Books Online.
trans-unit.target: 有关 SQL Server 隔离级别的详细信息，请参阅"隔离级别中数据库引擎"在 SQL Server 联机丛书。

trans-unit.source: Rolls back a transaction from a pending state.
trans-unit.target: 从挂起状态回滚事务。

trans-unit.source: Rolls back a transaction from a pending state.
trans-unit.target: 从挂起状态回滚事务。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> method is equivalent to the Transact-SQL ROLLBACK TRANSACTION statement.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法相当于 TRANSACT-SQL ROLLBACK TRANSACTION 语句。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see SQL Server Books Online.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 SQL Server 联机丛书。

trans-unit.source: The transaction can only be rolled back from a pending state (after <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> has been called, but before <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A> is called).
trans-unit.target: 事务可以仅回滚从挂起状态 (后<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>已调用之前<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>称为)。

trans-unit.source: The transaction is rolled back in the event it is disposed before `Commit` or `Rollback` is called.
trans-unit.target: 在调用之前释放回滚事务`Commit`或`Rollback`调用。

trans-unit.source: `Try`/`Catch` exception handling should always be used when rolling back a transaction.
trans-unit.target: `Try`/`Catch` 在回滚事务时，应始终使用异常处理。

trans-unit.source: A `Rollback` generates an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> if the connection is terminated or if the transaction has already been rolled back on the server.
trans-unit.target: A`Rollback`生成<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>如果终止连接或事务已在服务器上回滚。

trans-unit.source: For more information on SQL Server transactions, see "Explicit Transactions" and "Coding Efficient Transactions" in SQL Server Books Online.
trans-unit.target: 对 SQL Server 中的事务的详细信息，请参阅"显式事务"和 SQL Server 联机丛书中的"编码高效事务"。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> and a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>和<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 它还演示如何使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>， <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>，和<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The transaction is rolled back on any error.
trans-unit.target: 事务将回滚，在有任何错误。

trans-unit.source: `Try`/`Catch` error handling is used to handle any errors when attempting to commit or roll back the transaction.
trans-unit.target: `Try`/`Catch` 错误处理用于处理任何错误，当尝试提交或回滚事务时。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 在尝试提交事务时出错。

trans-unit.source: The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 已提交或回滚事务。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The connection is broken.
trans-unit.target: 连接已断开。

trans-unit.source: The name of the transaction to roll back, or the savepoint to which to roll back.
trans-unit.target: 要回滚的事务的名称，或要回滚到的保存点的名称。

trans-unit.source: Rolls back a transaction from a pending state, and specifies the transaction or savepoint name.
trans-unit.target: 从挂起状态回滚事务，并指定事务或保存点名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> method is equivalent to the Transact-SQL ROLLBACK TRANSACTION statement.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法相当于 TRANSACT-SQL ROLLBACK TRANSACTION 语句。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see "Explicit Transactions" and "Transaction Savepoints" in SQL Server Books Online.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅"显式事务"和 SQL Server 联机丛书中的"事务保存点"。

trans-unit.source: The transaction can only be rolled back from a pending state (after <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> has been called, but before <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A> is called).
trans-unit.target: 事务可以仅回滚从挂起状态 (后<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>已调用之前<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>称为)。

trans-unit.source: The transaction is rolled back if it is disposed before `Commit` or `Rollback` is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果在释放之前回滚事务`Commit`或`Rollback`调用。

trans-unit.source: `Try`/`Catch` exception handling should always be used when rolling back a transaction.
trans-unit.target: `Try`/`Catch` 在回滚事务时，应始终使用异常处理。

trans-unit.source: A `Rollback` generates an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> if the connection is terminated or if the transaction has already been rolled back on the server.
trans-unit.target: A`Rollback`生成<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>如果终止连接或事务已在服务器上回滚。

trans-unit.source: For more information on SQL Server transactions, see "Explicit Transactions" and "Coding Efficient Transactions" in SQL Server Books Online.
trans-unit.target: 对 SQL Server 中的事务的详细信息，请参阅"显式事务"和 SQL Server 联机丛书中的"编码高效事务"。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection> and a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection>和<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction>。

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 它还演示如何使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>， <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Commit%2A>，和<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The transaction is rolled back on any error.
trans-unit.target: 事务将回滚，在有任何错误。

trans-unit.source: `Try`/`Catch` error handling is used to handle any errors when attempting to commit or roll back the transaction.
trans-unit.target: `Try`/`Catch` 错误处理用于处理任何错误，当尝试提交或回滚事务时。

trans-unit.source: No transaction name was specified.
trans-unit.target: 未指定事务名称。

trans-unit.source: The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 已提交或回滚事务。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The connection is broken.
trans-unit.target: 连接已断开。

trans-unit.source: The name of the savepoint.
trans-unit.target: 保存点的名称。

trans-unit.source: Creates a savepoint in the transaction that can be used to roll back a part of the transaction, and specifies the savepoint name.
trans-unit.target: 在事务中创建保存点（它可用于回滚事务的一部分），并指定保存点名称。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Save%2A> method is equivalent to the Transact-SQL SAVE TRANSACTION statement.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Save%2A> 方法是等效于 TRANSACT-SQL SAVE TRANSACTION 语句。

trans-unit.source: The value used in the `savePoint` parameter can be the same value used in the `transactionName` parameter of some implementations of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 中使用的值`savePoint`参数可以是相同的值中使用`transactionName`参数的某些实现<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.BeginTransaction%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Savepoints offer a mechanism to roll back parts of transactions.
trans-unit.target: 保存点提供一种机制来回滚事务的部分。

trans-unit.source: You create a savepoint using the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Save%2A> method, and then later call the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A> method to roll back to the savepoint instead of rolling back to the start of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 创建保存点使用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Save%2A>方法，并且稍后调用<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction.Rollback%2A>方法回滚到保存点，而不是回滚到事务的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while trying to commit the transaction.
trans-unit.target: 在尝试提交事务时出错。

trans-unit.source: The transaction has already been committed or rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 已提交或回滚事务。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The connection is broken.
trans-unit.target: 连接已断开。
